channel.title: Classes :: IT From Scratch
channel.description: Syntax Input class Car: def __init__(self, make, model, year): self.make = make self.model = model self.year = year self.is_running = False def start(self): self.is_running = True print("Car started.") def drive(self): if self.is_running: print("Car is moving.") else: print("Car is not started yet.") my_car = Car("Toyota", "Corolla", 2022) print('My car: ', my_car.make, my_car.model, my_car.year) my_car.start() my_car.drive() Output My car: Toyota Corolla 2022 Car started. Car is moving. Inheritance Input
